Why Choose LayerOnline for Your WordPress/Web Hosting?

SEO Optimized

We utilize the latest in hosting technology and our premium network, combined with our partnership with CloudFlare. Your website speed is among the top 10% of the Internet (verified with pingdom and gtmetrix with optimized WP setup). That means more happier visitors and lower CPC cost, and higher SEO ranking. Your website also resolve faster with AnyCast DNS and load fast with Nginx.

24/7 Live Chat + Toll Free

Not many web hosting providers offer true 24/7/365 live chat plus toll free support. Whenever you have a question or problem about your domain, even at 3am in the morning, we are just a click away, fixing your problem right on the spot. Our average wait time is less than 30 seconds.

Rated #1 in customer service by HostAdvice. At LayerOnline customers are always number 1. You always get the highest quality products and services from us.

Cloud Backup (LayerOnline Exclusive)

We understand that your business is important to you and your data is your most valuable digital asset. that's why we backup your website to Google Cloud Storage daily, weekly, monthly and for up to one year. It's a time machine for your website.

99.95% Uptime SLA

The main reason many customers chose to stay with us is due to our excellent uptime. Because uptime means business and even few seconds of downtime can cost you thousands of dollars. Our rock solid hosting platform is able to handle massive amount of traffic, even during peak shopping seasons. We use rebootless kernel so there is no need to reboot for kernel patches. We are able to meet and exceed our 99.95% uptime SLA.

Security

Both your client area and cPanel are guarded with two-factor authentication. Every webpage hit is scanned in real-time for threats such as SQL injection and malware. Malware database is updated daily for highest level of security. Your web server is behind and protected by CloudFlare CDN so your web server IP is hidden from attackers. Your websites are also protected by our Anti-DDOS Guard.

Interface

Our client area is based on the latest responsive bootstrap interface. It looks beautiful on desktop and any type of mobile devices. The layout was designed so everything is at your fingertips.

Support

You get great around the clock support from our knowledgeable staff within seconds. You can reach us on Facebook, Twitter, online chat, skype, email and our ticketing system.

Web Hosting At Fraction of Price

At LayerOnline, we focus on providing our clients with quality service and great customer experience. We will not try to waste your time on upselling all the options. We have the best in hosting technology with many premium features all available exclusively to you free of charge. All our hosting packages include everything you need to have a great website.

All premium features come standard: SSD, AnyCast DNS, CDN, SSL, DDOS Guard, Nginx, isolated hosting environment, free domain in 20 TLDs, Softaculous, Site Builder, daily local backup, one year cloud backup, unlimited bandwidth, unlimited domains, unlimited databases and more.
